query:
SELECT 'team_coins' as table_name, team, coinsRemaining FROM team_coins WHERE team IN ('Thunder', 'Clippers')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'players', name, team FROM players WHERE team IN ('Thunder', 'Clippers')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'fa_transactions', player, team FROM fa_transactions WHERE team IN ('Thunder', 'Clippers')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'fa_bids', player, team FROM fa_bids WHERE team IN ('Thunder', 'Clippers');
